description: A flow chart that shows how Mr. Trump’s lawyer saw to it that a porn star and a former Playboy model received payments after alleging affairs with Mr. Trump.
title: The Links Among Michael Cohen, Trump and Hush Payments to Women
title_page: The Links Among Michael Cohen, Trump and Hush Payments to Women - The New York Times
text: Michael D. Cohen, President Trump’s former fixer, said in court on Tuesday that he arranged payments to two women during the 2016 campaign “at the direction” of Mr. Trump “for the principal purpose of influencing the election.” Mr. Cohen pleaded guilty to campaign finance violations related to the payments.
